price: بيا به الله توبه قبوله كړي چاته يې چې خوښه شي او الله بخښونكى مهربان دى.
arabic: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: thumma yatūbu al-lahu min baʿdi dhālika ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
